sentences.en: Chou Chung - wei himself rubbed his hands with glee and joined in their laughter.
sentences.cn: 周仲伟 很满意似的搓搓手,也哈哈大笑.

sentences.en: Deerslayer laughed again, and seemed to enjoy the success of the exploit with much glee.
sentences.cn: 杀鹿人又笑了, 他对这次冒险行动所取得的成功大为高兴.

sentences.en: He rubbed his hands in glee as he thought of all the money he would make.
sentences.cn: 他想到自己将赚到那么多钱就高兴得直搓手。

sentences.en: He was feeling a little glee now as thought of how easily he had managed it.
sentences.cn: 想起事情这样轻易就对付了过去,他有些扬扬得意.

sentences.en: I was amazed at their unbridled glee.
sentences.cn: 他们那兴高采烈的痛快劲儿真让我吃惊.

sentences.en: Manufacturers are rubbing their hands with glee as they prepare to cash in.
sentences.cn: 厂家准备收钱的时候高兴得直搓手。

sentences.en: She clapped her hands in childish glee.
sentences.cn: 她孩子气地高兴地拍着手.

sentences.en: She couldn't disguise her glee at their discomfiture.
sentences.cn: 他们受挫,她不禁喜形于色.

sentences.en: She has all the glee of a little girl let loose in a sweetie shop.
sentences.cn: 她像糖果店里无人管束的小女孩那样兴高采烈。

sentences.en: She was in high glee when she learnt the news.
sentences.cn: 她得知这消息高兴之至.

sentences.en: Soon her glee turns to fear.
sentences.cn: 很快她的欢欣变成了恐惧.

sentences.en: The light of victory shone in Wu Sun - fu's eyes, and he rubbed his hands with glee.
sentences.cn: 吴荪 甫 的脸上亮着胜利的红光, 他踌躇满志地搓着手.

sentences.en: The little girl jumped about in glee when she saw the new toys.
sentences.cn: 那小女孩一见到新玩具就高兴万分地跳了起来.

sentences.en: The newcomer rubbed his hands with glee.
sentences.cn: 那个新来的人快快活活地搓着双手.

sentences.en: There was much glee among journalists over the leaked letter.
sentences.cn: 那封被泄密的信让记者们很是兴奋。

trans.tran_cn: 快乐，欢喜，重唱的歌曲，[乐]合唱曲
trans.tran_en: a feeling of satisfaction and excitement, often because something bad has happened to someone else
